channel.title: Help downloading SCAR
channel.description: Well, I have had scar for quite a while now, so i decided to look at some scripts. To my surprise i couldn't open them :eek: . I go to my scar folder and I double click scar and I get an error message saying scar has been deleted. I try to uninstall scar, but it says its still running(wtf). I only have one account on this computer, scar ISN'T running and I cant install scar because its still installed. Help would be thanked but i cant rep you. EDIT: i know about that one program with boot in its name, is there anything else I can do without downloading things?

item.title: Help downloading SCAR
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Nashi:

Doesn’t dylock only have SCAR 2.03?

Dylock has 3.06 as the latest.

Read full topic

item.title: Help downloading SCAR
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

well i used search for scar and nothing, and i looked through all the tabs on the task manager and could not find scar. Deleting the folder didn’t help either. I have vista if that helps anybody out there. Before this happened my avg said scar was a trojan (it isnt I downloaded it right off dylock). It kept on asking me to delete it and I never did. Does any of this help?

Read full topic

item.title: Help downloading SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Wow, That’s a hard one…
Only thing I can think of is to check Task Manager for an Instance of scar.exe and end it,
Then trying to uninstall it again,
Or install if again into a different directory.

Try deleting the folder you installed SCAR into, then Uninstalling via Add\Remove programs in Control Panel.

Read full topic

item.title: Help downloading SCAR
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

Well, I have had scar for quite a while now, so i decided to look at some scripts. To my surprise i couldn’t open them :eek: . I go to my scar folder and I double click scar and I get an error message saying scar has been deleted. I try to uninstall scar, but it says its still running(wtf). I only have one account on this computer, scar ISN’T running and I cant install scar because its still installed. Help would be thanked but i cant rep you.
EDIT: i know about that one program with boot in its name, is there anything else I can do without downloading things?
